original_text: And you must also love each other. That is the most important thing that you should do. Love holds all these good things completely together.
korean_text: 이 모든 것 위에 사랑을 더하라 이는 온전하게 매는 띠니라

sentences.original_text: And you must also love each other
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너희는 또한 서로를 사랑해야 한다

sentences.original_text: That is the most important thing
Love holds all these good things
sentences.korean_translation: 사랑은 이 모든 좋은 것들을 붙잡는다
